resources.string: Keep devices on the same WiFi Network, correct vault and pair devices.\nMake sure no other devices are running Vultisig.
Reshare vault with a new committee

Amount must be a positive number

VULT tokens are burnt from fees.
VULT tokens are airdropped to users.
Keep devices on the same WiFi Network with Vultisig open.
I am aware that the vault will be deleted permanently
I am aware that I can lose funds

You are permanently deleting your vault
Can I recover my assets if I lose a device?
How does the crypto vault app secure my cryptocurrencies?
What cryptocurrencies are supported by Vultisig?
How do I set up my crypto vault?
No, there are no registration requirements.
You can back-up your vault by exporting the vault shares.
Vultisig only charges a flat fee on swap and bridging. There are no other hidden fees.
Vultisig is audited, open-source and uses a very well-proven TSS library.
All assets supported by Trust Wallet Core are supported in Vultisig.
Get 2 or more of your devices together and connected to your local WiFi, Hotspot or internet. Then simply pair them via QR code and create a new vault. You can then send funds in.
I agree with the amount I will receive after the swap
Amount must be a positive number
Connect all devices to the same Network with Vultisig open

Extension not supported. Backup failed. Supported file extensions are: %s
Reshare can be used to refresh, expand or reduce the amount of devices in a Vault.
For all Reshare actions the threshold of devices is always required.
Threshold not reached\nMissing enough initial devices

Please use “Skip Password” to save without password
Network connection lost. Please check your internet connection

Ensure you leave enough funds to cover the fees. If an account balance falls below 1 DOT (Existential Deposit), the account will be deactivated (reaped) and any remaining funds will be lost. You can reactivate the address with a new deposit larger than the existential deposit at any time. However, this will not recover the lost funds.
Transaction time out due to slow signing.\nPlease try again.
This address is not valid for %s

Ensure you leave enough funds to cover the fees. If an account balance falls below 1 XRP (Existential Deposit), the account will be deactivated (reaped) and any remaining funds will be lost. You can reactivate the address with a new deposit larger than the existential deposit at any time. However, this will not recover the lost funds.
The to address must be different from the from address
if a device is lost or damaged

each device needs its own backup.

giving complete control over your assets

on Android, iOS, macOS and Windows
This should only take a second
Scan QR with other device. 3-device setup recommended, 2 is sufficient.
You can always rename your vault later in settings
This email is only used to send the server backup
This occurs because the password is used to locally encrypt the backup file, similar to how a hard drive is encrypted. In the following step, you have the option to add a hint.
Password cannot be reset or recovered
This will be shown in case you forget your password
Enter the 4 digit code\nwe emailed you
This code will confirm that you’ve received your vault share 1 via email
Do you want to add a password to your device vault shares?

We recommend that you do not set a backup password for device vault shares-your data is safe if the backups are properly stored in different locations, which is already a significant protection. Remember, backup passwords can\'t be recovered if you forget them. Your choice!
and sign faster than ever before
You’ll create new Vault Share backups,
store them as you did before
